thread.title: Liberals Apparently Have a Problem with Chick-Fil-A’s New Promotion
thread.title_full: Liberals Apparently Have a Problem with Chick-Fil-A’s New Promotion

author: John S. Roberts
title: Liberals Apparently Have a Problem with Chick-Fil-A’s New Promotion
text:
Actress Ashley Judd is a big fan of the Kentucky Wildcats men’s basketball team. 
As a liberal, she’s not a fan of America’s favorite fast food restaurant , Chick-Fil-A. 
Yesterday, Judd went on a rant about a promotion the company was having during a Wildcats game. 
She was apparently upset because Chick-Fil-A is giving away tickets for free sandwiches if a player from the other team misses two consecutive free throws. 
Catch that? 
A player from the other team. Your promotion for fans to cheer against kids attempting free throws is tacky. Please find another in game promotion. @ChickfilA 
— ashley judd (@AshleyJudd) January 4, 2017 It's one thing to want to win. It's another thing to root for kids to lose so we get a product. We are better than that! #BBN @ChickfilA https://t.co/SJiUpSLSlC 
— ashley judd (@AshleyJudd) January 4, 2017 I prefer missed shots because of defense, steals, blocks, players being rattled by my team & the gym. Not because fans get a treat. https://t.co/spOCJoQWKD 
— ashley judd (@AshleyJudd) January 4, 2017 
Reactions… . @AshleyJudd Maybe you don't understand, we WANT the opponent to miss. Always. Every single time. Free chicken biscuit or not.
